== Peter Escamilla ==

=== About me ===

I'm Peter Escamilla, a Systems Engineer from <nowiki>[[http://www.unal.edu.co|Universidad Nacional de Colombia]]</nowiki>, I live in Bogotá, Colombia and I met Linux since I were a kid though I haven't researched or helped much on it. I like open source, and would love to help on it, I also like games. Right now I'm working as a software developer in java EE with my machine on Ubuntu 14.04 and on my home I also use Ubuntu.

=== Contact Information ===

* Email: pescamillam@gmail.com
* Launchpad Account: <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~pescamillam|pescamillam]]</nowiki>
* Forum's Nick: pescamillam
* IRC's Nick: pescamillam

=== Personal goals ===

* Be up to date in IT
* Be happy

=== Ubuntu-co goals ===

* Be in touch with the open-source community
* Help with some projects of the community

=== Contributions ===
 
* Some editions to LoCo Wiki
* Some translations on Launchpad
* Creation of latest ubuntu co Android App https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ubuntuco.launcher (down as Google thinks I'm impersonating the community)
